website_summaries.verdict: A well-built quiet pedestal fan with smart functionality that'll make your life a lot more comfortable.
pros: Controlled via app and virtual assistants
Smart mode to simulate a natural breeze
cons: Blue LED lights are too bright

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth running and quite
customer_reviews.text: Its literally a life saver. This lockdown was driving me insane with the kids in the house and home workouts. I bought this fan as I wanted some good night sleep, the last thing I wanted was a disruption to my sleep. I automate the fan to turn on at certain intervals throughout the night and always put on swing of course. Throughout the day my kids use the fan when they are having their siesta. Very simple and straightforward to use but at the same time sophisticated enough to control with schedule and all the automation. The noise is absolutely minimal, so amazing you forget you have it on. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fan....tastic
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. I wanted a big fan. It's a big fan. It connected to Smart life easily, I always use AP mode. I have to say that the setup was much easier than my Teckin switches and light bulbs. It would probably set up equally well with their own App, but I like to have all my kit operating from Smartlife if possible. I like the smart feature, it adds a little life to its operation. Last but not least.. It's a British start up design. Might be made in China but isn't everything.
customer_reviews.author: Steverabs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. Total commitment to helping us when we could not connect the fan. A technician came to our home the next day and found the problem. Continuous contact by e-mail on Saturday and Sunday. This team deserves your support - this fan does everything they advertise. I heartily recommend them. This a genuine comment from a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Wrinklymike

customer_reviews.title: Simple to set up and easy to operate, even from the app. Not quite as quiet as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: This fan is at the pricey end of the market largely due to the interactive technology it employs. It is very easy to put together (even without reading the instructions!) and operation is straightforward. They have clearly invested some time and money into the app so operate the fan from your phone etc. It downloads cleanly and is very intuitive in use. Much is made of how quiet this fan is, and although it's certainly a lot quieter than our old phone it's not as quiet as I'd hoped, plus the blue lights are non dimmable for night use, which would be a great improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M Huber

customer_reviews.title: Great product & fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product - it’s quiet & has a timer / schedule, which you can set so the fan can automatically switch itself off, which is great if you’re using overnight. We had a question in relation to the fan and the customer service was really outstanding. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C ROBERTSON

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, difficult to assemble, impossible to connect to wifi.
customer_reviews.text: Congratulations to anyone who actually manages to pair it with the router. My attempts keep‘timing out’ no matter what. The trouble-shooting list icludes ‘helpful’ suggestions such as, ‘ Only 2.4G Wi-Fi is supported at this moment, please check if the Wi-Fi network is 2.4G.’ and, ‘ Make sure that the encryption method of the router’s wireless setting is WPA2-PSK and the authentication type is AES, or both are set as automatic. 11nonly is not allowed in wireless mode.’ Without wifi functionality this is a very overpriced piece of hard-to-assemble plastic. I would never have bought it had I known I’d have to get an engineering degree to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherric

customer_reviews.title: AirGo Smart Fan Black - Control
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant fan nice and quiet, lots of speeds, took 10 mins to build out of the box, 2 mins to download the fan app to connect to WiFi and a few minutes to add to alexia as a group and routines voice command. Easy to use and value for money would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, love it
customer_reviews.text: This fan is totally brilliant, it’s really quite and the smart functions are awesome. I love that it can be fully controlled from the smart life app which I have for other plugs etc......
customer_reviews.author: Whitehead180

customer_reviews.title: Smart fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the new fan works with Alexa and an app
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you like a dark room at night
customer_reviews.text: Took 3 hours for Wi-fi to connect then when setup it was like having a floodlight shining in the room from the blue led lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, easy to put together with the help of YouTube. Having trouble connecting to internet hopefully will get that resolved soon
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Dowler

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected and produces a nice breeze.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice fan but a little disappointing. There's very little difference between smart mode and night mode. I personally find the varying changes in speed and noise to be annoying. The app is limited to the 2.4 gigahertz WIFI so I'm not able to use it since I only use the 5 gigahertz WIFI range.
customer_reviews.author: gregory p konneker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good fan , easy to set up, could use a slower mode which would make it run quieter at night, but quieter than most fans. Was missing fixings, but contacted geosmart via email and replacements sent out straight away. Excellent customer service from Vivian, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Wi-fi connection impossible
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get this to connect to WiFi after days of trying. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: R Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an Alexa compatible pedestal fan and this was the only option. Compared to the previous one I was using, it is quieter but slightly smaller and slightly less powerful. One star knocked off because it's overpriced and there are no instructions on how to connect it to Alexa (you need to download both the Geo SmartPro app and also the Smart Life app).
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Quality Fan
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet in operation and does a good job at cooling you down. The features in Alexa voice control for the Fan are very limited indeed; you can't operate the Swing via Alexa for example. The Lights on the FAN at night are glaring and way too bright (easily sorted by putting a piece of cardboard over the controls on the unit).
customer_reviews.author: MadDog Stu

customer_reviews.title: Smart connection impossible
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking and well made product. However like so many other reviews, I’ve been unable to connect to or use the app. Being an engineer I thought, ok how hard can it be.... Well as it turns out hours and hours wasted it’s impossible (It should not be this difficult). Therefore this product turns out to be a pretty expensive fan....
customer_reviews.author: John :- Perth

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Poor design and hard to build. Shame as good idea.

customer_reviews.text: The AirGo fan is amazing at night! I just set the automation setting on the GeoSmartPro app and the fan runs whenever the temperature rise in the room. I love that it works with alexa and Google home it is so convenient
